schema.name: page_builder
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "page_builder" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `pages_id` char(36) NULL, `item` varchar(255) NULL, `sort` integer NULL, `collection` varchar(255) NULL, CONSTRAINT `page_builder_pages_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`pages_id`) REFERENCES `pages` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: page_builder_content
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "page_builder_content" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `headline` varchar(255) null, `content` text null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: page_builder_features
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "page_builder_features" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `headline` varchar(255) null, `features` json null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: page_builder_hero
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "page_builder_hero" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `headline` varchar(255) NULL, `content` text NULL, `image` char(36) NULL, `buttons` json NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `page_builder_hero_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: pages
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "pages" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `date_created` datetime NULL, `user_updated` char(36) NULL, `date_updated` datetime NULL, `user_created` char(36) NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `pages_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `pages_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `pages_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: posts
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "posts" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `sort` integer NULL, `user_created` char(36) NULL, `date_created` datetime NULL, `user_updated` char(36) NULL, `date_updated` datetime NULL, `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `posts_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `posts_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `posts_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)
